DOC.brief_title: Multi Centre Study Comparing OsseoSpeed TX With OsseoSpeed

Deemed investigator `` functional '' oppose dentition time load implant . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Unlikely able comply study procedure , judge investigator 2 . Systemic local disease condition would compromise postoperative heal and/or osseointegration 7 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus 8 .
